description: With just the right blend of stretchy warmth and casual vibes, the Polartec® Double Brushed Hoody is a soft and comfortable midweight fleece that can take a hike, meet friends for a beer, or do both in the same afternoon. Made with Polartec® 200 Recycled fleece and a vintage, woven feel, this hoody is the perfect fuss-free layer for everyday outdoor comfort.
name: Mountain Hardwear Polartec Double Brushed Full Zip Hoody - Mens

specs.value: 100% Recycled Polyester Heather - 87% Recycled Polyester, 13% Polyester
